trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions" /> enumeration defines values used in file transfer requests.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions" /> 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 定義檔案傳輸要求中使用的值。

trans-unit.source: **Note** The flags Disconnect and ReuseSocket return the socket to a disconnected, reusable state after the file has been transmitted.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**傳輸檔案之後，中斷連線和 ReuseSocket 返回通訊端中斷連接，可重複使用的旗標狀態。

trans-unit.source: These flags should not be used on a socket where quality of service (QOS) has been requested, because the service provider might immediately delete any quality of service associated with the socket before the file transfer has completed.
trans-unit.target: 這些旗標不應在其中的服務品質 (QOS) 已要求，通訊端上因為服務提供者可能會立即刪除的任何檔案傳輸完成前，通訊端與相關聯的服務品質。

trans-unit.source: The best approach for a QOS-enabled socket is to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> when the file transfer has completed, rather than relying on these flags.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 QOS 的通訊端的最佳方法是呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>完成檔案傳輸，而不需依賴這些旗標。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.ReuseSocket> in a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendFile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.ReuseSocket>呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendFile%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The file "test.txt" is located in the root directory of the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 檔案"test.txt"位於本機電腦的根目錄中。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a prebuffer and postbuffer of data are created and sent to the remote host with the file.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，緩衝和後置的資料所建立，並傳送至遠端主機的檔案。

trans-unit.source: To use the system's default thread, UseDefaultWorkerThread is specified.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用系統的預設執行緒，被指定 UseDefaultWorkerThread。

trans-unit.source: Start a transport-level disconnect after all the file data has been queued for transmission.
trans-unit.target: 所有檔案資料都已加入佇列準備傳送後，啟動傳輸層中斷連接。

trans-unit.source: When used with <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.ReuseSocket" />, these flags return the socket to a disconnected, reusable state after the file has been transmitted.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.ReuseSocket" /> 搭配使用時，在傳送檔案之後，這些旗標會將通訊端返回至中斷連接、可重複使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The socket handle may be reused when the request completes.
trans-unit.target: 完成要求後，可以重複使用通訊端控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This flag is valid only if <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.Disconnect" /> is also specified.
trans-unit.target: 只有在同時指定 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.Disconnect" /> 時，這個旗標才有效。

trans-unit.source: When used with <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.Disconnect" />, these flags return the socket to a disconnected, reusable state after the file has been transmitted.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.Disconnect" /> 搭配使用時，在傳送檔案之後，這些旗標會將通訊端返回至中斷連接、可重複使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use the default thread to process long file transfer requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設執行緒處理過長的檔案傳輸要求。

trans-unit.source: Use kernel asynchronous procedure calls (APCs) instead of worker threads to process long file transfer requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用核心非同步程序呼叫 (APC) 替代背景工作執行緒 (Worker Thread)，處理過長的檔案傳輸要求。

trans-unit.source: Long requests are defined as requests that require more than a single read from the file or a cache; the request therefore depends on the size of the file and the specified length of the send packet.
trans-unit.target: 過長要求的定義是需要多次讀取檔案或快取的要求，也就是要求要視檔案的大小和傳送封包的指定長度而定。

trans-unit.source: Use system threads to process long file transfer requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用系統執行緒處理過長的檔案傳輸要求。

trans-unit.source: Complete the file transfer request immediately, without pending.
trans-unit.target: 立即完成檔案傳輸要求，無暫止。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is specified and the file transfer succeeds, the data has been accepted by the system but not necessarily acknowledged by the remote end.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定這個旗標，且檔案傳輸成功，則系統已經接受資料，而沒有必要得到遠端的通知。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this flag with the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.Disconnect" /> and <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.ReuseSocket" /> flags.
trans-unit.target: 請勿將這個旗標與 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.Disconnect" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.ReuseSocket" /> 旗標搭配使用。
